name: Gallus: Bazaar Eggscapade
description:
So what is Gallus: Bazaar Eggscapade anyway?!

In the game we play as Gallus, a delivery rooster, in his village called  Sunny Side.

Gallus must go on a grand eggscapade in order to help keep his village safe from dastardly visitors who threaten to gobble up his village of fellow chicken friends.

Gallus will encounter puzzles, terrible puns and help his friends along the way…maybe he’ll make new friends too!

Will he be able to keep his island safe?! 

Gallus: Bazaar Eggscapade is being created by Starry Summit Games!

You can find us on:

Website, Twitter, Discord and Youtube
